title: Stylish Chicago City Break in Northbrook Village with Outdoor Pool, Restaurant & Bar
description: Just twenty minutes from touchdown at O’Hare International Airport, a stay at Crowne Plaza Chicago - Northbrook, an IHG Hotel offers an upscale escape right in the heart of one of the city’s most charming historic neighbourhoods. After days spent exploring the Windy City’s best - including the Chicago Botanic Garden and Kohl Children’s Museum - celebrate the spirit of the the city with a slice deep dish pizza at Chicago 2875 Restaurant and Bar.
